name: wordpress-expert
description: Expert WordPress diagnostics: security audits, performance analysis, code quality review, and plugin conflict resolution for site reliability.

connect.description: Connect to a WordPress site via SSH, detect WP-CLI, sync files, and save profile

status.description: View connected sites, sync status, diagnostic health summaries, and manage site profiles (list, remove, default, rename)

diagnose.description: Run diagnostic suite with full, security-only, or code-only modes on connected WordPress sites

diagnostic-core-integrity.description: WP-CLI verify-checksums for core file integrity checking

diagnostic-config-security.description: wp-config.php security analysis for debug mode, salts, file editing

diagnostic-user-audit.description: User account security audit for admin username, role counts, inactive users

diagnostic-version-audit.description: WordPress core, plugin, and theme version and update status checking

diagnostic-malware-scan.description: Pattern-based suspicious code detection for backdoors, obfuscation, and malicious patterns

diagnostic-code-quality.description: AI-powered code quality analysis for active theme and custom plugins

report-generator.description: Compiles diagnostic findings into structured markdown reports with A-F health grades and archive management
